name: math
description: 适合程序员的高数入门课
author: 耗子

scripts.docker: open http://127.0.0.1:8520/lab && docker run -h 'Math' -it --rm -p 8520:8888 -v $PWD/docs:/notebooks -v $PWD/.cache/config:/home/ubuntu/.jupyter -v  $PWD/.cache/local:/home/ubuntu/.local haozhi/tensorflow zsh -c '. ~/.zshrc && jupyter lab --ip=0.0.0.0 --NotebookApp.token=""'
